extension.news:
v1.0.15 (2025-11-22) - Fix a crash when showing all available series from the main menu
v1.0.14 (2025-02-13) - Add menu entry to browse videos by genre (by rantan-plan) - Preselect library and credentials during (re-)login if present (by rantan-plan) - Internal code optimizations
v1.0.13 (2025-02-04) - Tell user to login again manually when automatic token refresh failed
v1.0.12 (2024-08-02) - Fix sorting of seasons and episodes of a series
v1.0.11 (2024-04-21) - Add support for IP based login - Show an error if a library only offers login methods not supported by this addon
v1.0.10 (2024-02-27) - Add support for Austrian and Swiss libraries On login users now first have to select their country
v1.0.9 (2024-02-05) - Automatically refresh an expired access_token When updating from an earlier version, the autorefresh only works after the next manual login
